description: Demolition of existing two storey building / separate individual structures. Erection of new part 2 / part 3 storey residential development to provide 35 residential units (consisting of 3 x 3 bed dwelling houses, 4 x 4 bed dwelling houses, 10 x 1 bed flats and 18 x 2 bed flats). Construction of external parking (16 spaces), ancillary structures and landscaped areas.
